UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Semisynthetic Macrocyclic Lipo-lanthipeptides Display Antimicrobial Activity Against Bacterial Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Xu Y, Viel JH, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15975(MIC=>32µM),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µM),Shigella flexneri ATCC 29903(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µM)
